name: Mindfield 64
description:
Adapted VIC20 game ported to the C64 in 2020.
Changes to the software to accomodate the larger screen on the C64.

Traverse across a minefield to get to the other side to home indicated by the letter 'H'.

Your only assistance is a mine detector that tells you the number of mines that are currently around you. 

Controls: Navigation keys (up, down, left, right).
